post.body: And we don't get a lot of love so let me say thanks.
Depends ...are they going to come bearing gifts. If so, I prefer booze and beef above all others.
I've got many, but you can't beat a Shiner Bock. And then there is rum.
Kept trying to figure out why i missed your comments. Somehow I was no longer following you, but I fixed that.
Now you're trying to trap me. The gist of my comment was that a few beers in I'm liable to tell all my secrets.
Pork you at dawn? Does that mean he's going to cook you bacon and ham for breakfast?
I did see that movie, but thankfully I missed those doofuses appearance.
I'll agree, you do have a great smile. Infectious as a matter of fact. But I still ain't tellin'. Not without a beer or three.
I wake up, click on twitter and find you praising me at the top of the page. What a nice way to start the day. Thanks.
Greetings.
Shhhh ... Don't tell everyone.
Instead of a kitten what you really need is a bulldog.
You've outed the truth. Really USPS bosses bring strippers right in to work this time of year. Keeps moral up.
Nope, didn't get that tweet, but surely you don't really expect me to simply tell you the answer to that question.
I think it as about 7 bucks a day.
Maybe i could get a second job being a shopping bodyguard keeping the perfumers away from shoppers like paparazzi from celebs.
Let me know if you need backup.
Singles! I'm a better tipper than that. Treat me right and there may just be a 5 spot in it.
My boys are excited as well. What happened to your avatar?
and we've had 40mph winds to go with our 40degree temps. Giving us wind chills in the teens.
Hey you changed your name. I got a new old phone. A friend gave me their old one so I could read the screen.
But shouldn't you have a gold tooth and a purple tophat?
Pimp away my friend.
What's an RT? And can't we all use some pimping?
Vicodin and Vodka is almost as much fun as Ritalin and rum.
Elvis would be proud.
Meat and cheese on mine. The other poor souls wasted valuable gut space on those evil veggies. But not me.
I don't eat eggs or drink their nog. Lettuce is the devil but items that appear from chickens arses aren't high on my edible list either.
You know those two guys who do the Sonic ads? If I ever see one in real life I'm gonna smack him a footlong coney sized whoopin'.
Made it to denver now oN to the sunrhinestate.
Amarillo to orlando via denver.
Sitting at airport about to fly out to disney world.
Hope all of y'all have a great one as well. Whatever your one happens to be.
or maybe even a Texan, that is hairy.
Steak in a plate. Rum in a mug. Tunes that are great. My family to hug. That is a Christmas worthy of a geezle or any old nairy ...
Looking for my partridge in a per tree. The partridge might be tasty, but I don't care for pears. I'd rather have a steak in a plate.
just got home from Wal-Mart. It was a horrible experience and now I'm in a foul mood.
A test from my phone.
You know it's Christmas when family dysfunction and crappy music abound. http://tinyurl.com/73vdax But there are a few good holiday tunes.
The postal bosses are cooking us burgers as a Christmas present today.My gut is growling, hope we get faster delivery than the mail gets.
